revised_title: A Comprehensive Review of Astronomy and Mineral Water Research
tldr: This article provides a detailed overview of the state of astronomy and mineral water research in the late 17th century. It discusses various astronomical theories and hypotheses, including those proposed by Kepler, Ward, and Bullialdus, as well as the examination of mineral waters and their properties. The author emphasizes the challenges in understanding the composition and effects of mineral waters, including the mixtures of various substances, such as vapors, juices, salts, and earths, and their impact on human health.
